The best ending you could expect for a story like this ...
I mean ... usually in this type of story the garbage is coming out with his, without paying for it, It would be even better if everyone had died.

Not a hapy ending by any stretch of the imagination, but something I personally liked. It was justice, the scum learned there are consequences to being scum, that no matter how little disregard you may have for someone there is always someone who will get really pissed if you harm that someone. This one stands out as being something that at least tried to be different, despite the crappy implications in the end.
